subject: Automobile Racing
Oil (Petroleum) and Gasoline
lead_paragraph: Auto racing is the ultimate in gas-guzzling entertainment. But the prospect of paying $4 a gallon to get to the track has made some fans reluctant think twice.
snippet: Auto racing is the ultimate in gas-guzzling entertainment. But the prospect of paying $4 a gallon to get to the track has made some fans reluctant think twice.
